summary: Falgenheim is a player home, near to Riverwood!
descriptionHtml:
Hey there!

Falgenheim is my first mod/house ever, so i hope you like it!
It's located near Riverwood. But it automatically add's a marker to the map, so not finding it shouldn't be a problem.
t's also a lore friendly house and not to big (farmhouse-size) 

I hope you like it, And if you find any bugs or something else please say so!

Im planning to work on the empty places in the house, aswell for the alchemy area/Decorations.
And maybe adding a little garden to the outside.



*Maybe the download name is ''Moonsorrow'', i changed it to Falgenheim because i found out that Moonsorrow was a band.*
author: Delvarik
